resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2816</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">I like to -student activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ich mag - Kursteilnehmeraktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">J'aime - l'activité d'étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu gosto - da atividade do estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gradisco - l'attività dell'allievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπαθώ - δραστηριότητα σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tengo gusto - de actividad del estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student activity for assessment of an oral presentation where students prepare in writing and then talk about activities they enjoy such as their hobbies and interests</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hobbies</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeraktivität für Einschätzung 
einer Munddarstellung, in der Kursteilnehmer in Schreiben und dann 
sich vorbereiten, mit Aktivitäten sich befassen, die sie wie ihre 
Liebhabereien und Interessen genießen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité d'étudiant pour l'évaluation 
d'une présentation orale où les étudiants préparent dans 
l'écriture et puis parlent des activités qu'elles apprécient comme 
leurs passe-temps et intérêts</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade do estudante para a avaliação de 
uma apresentação oral onde os estudantes se preparem na escrita e 
então falem-se sobre atividades que aprecíam como seus passatempos e
interesses</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività dell'allievo per la valutazione di 
una presentazione orale dove gli allievi si preparano nella scrittura 
ed allora parla delle attività che godono quali i loro hobby ed 
interessi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση μιας 
προφορικής παρουσίασης όπου οι σπουδαστές προετοιμάζουν εγγράφως
να γράψουν και έπειτα συζήτηση για τις δραστηριότητες που 
απολαμβάνουν όπως τα χόμπι και τα ενδιαφέροντά τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad del estudiante para el gravamen de 
una presentación oral donde los estudiantes se preparan en la 
escritura y entonces hablan de actividades que gozan por ejemplo sus 
manías e intereses</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liebhabereien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">passe-temps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">passatempos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">hobby</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χόμπι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión oral</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">manías</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
